value.title: Component Libraries Overview - Power Apps
value.excerpt: Component Libraries enable reusing components across Apps within an environment. The components within a component library act like a master copy of the component.   Read more: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/power-platform-release-plan/2020wave1/microsoft-powerapps/canvas-components-are-generally

value.title: Power Apps Captcha Component - Responsive Reusable Control
